definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: After the discussion, we have lunch first.

sentences.chinese: 這家茶莊是縣城裏最大的一家。

definition: pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
appreciation of the finer things in life

surrounded by distinguished friends (idiom); in company
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies
